activities.name: Copy from Blob to SQL DB

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select 
    TABLE_SCHEMA, 
    TABLE_NAME, 
    CONCAT(LEFT(TABLE_NAME, CHARINDEX('_',TABLE_NAME) - 1), '.csv') as CSV_NAME
from @{pipeline().globalParameters.DatabaseName}.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.tables
where TABLE_NAME like '%LZ'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as short,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customer
source(output(
		CustomerID as short,
		AddressID as short,
		AddressType as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerLocation
Customer, CustomerLocation lookup(Customer@CustomerID == CustomerLocation@CustomerID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customer@CustomerID,
		Title,
		FirstName_sensitive = FirstName,
		MiddleName_sensitive = MiddleName,
		LastName_sensitive = LastName,
		Suffix,
		CompanyName,
		SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress_sensitive = EmailAddress,
		Phone_sensitive = Phone,
		PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = Customer@ModifiedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressType,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(each(match(right(name,length("_sensitive"))=="_sensitive"), $$ = sha2(256, $$))) ~> HashSensitiveData
HashSensitiveData select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		FirstName = FirstName_sensitive,
		MiddleName = MiddleName_sensitive,
		LastName = LastName_sensitive,
		Suffix,
		CompanyName,
		SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress = EmailAddress_sensitive,
		Phone_sensitive,
		PasswordHash,
		PasswordSalt,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressType,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

parameters{
	schemaName as string,
	tableName as string,
	businessKey as string
}
source(output(
		Name as string,
		{B&D Newcomer? (y/n)} as string,
		{Previous Knowledge of ADF? (y/n)} as string,
		SnapshotDateTime as timestamp,
		FilePath as string,
		rn as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: (concat("select *, rn = row_number() over(partition by ", $businessKey, " order by FilePath desc) from ", $schemaName, ".", $tableName)),
	format: 'query') ~> source1
Filter1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(rn==1) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:([$businessKey]),
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
